desc: Est. in 2015 to help spa owners and beauty salon businesses grow & take action towards their goals. We are a full fledged consulting group with access to high-end European and Canadian made spa equipment such as IPL machines for blond & white hairs & non-invasive Body Sculpting machines. Ask about our trade in policy!

layout.text: Owning a beauty based business can be easy and profitable, if you have the right partners.
